job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're looking for a Lead AI Engineer with a strong background in generative AI models and an interest in Privacy Enhancing Technologies (PET). The ideal candidate will explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations. You will be working with the Nillion Product team and report to Nillion's AI Product Lead., * You will design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing, in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team
     * You will work closely with our cryptography team, getting up to speed with the technical nuances & implementing AI models accordingly
     * You will adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm and technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
     * You will have regular touchpoints with AI developers on the Nillion network and integrate their feedback in our AI roadmap
     * You will work closely with our DevRel team and actively contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows
job_details.full_text:
Lead AI Engineer (Remote, Europe)

We're looking for a Lead AI Engineer with a strong background in generative AI models and an interest in Privacy Enhancing Technologies (PET). The ideal candidate will explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations. You will be working with the Nillion Product team and report to Nillion's AI Product Lead., * You will design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing, in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team
     * You will work closely with our cryptography team, getting up to speed with the technical nuances & implementing AI models accordingly
     * You will adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm and technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
     * You will have regular touchpoints with AI developers on the Nillion network and integrate their feedback in our AI roadmap
     * You will work closely with our DevRel team and actively contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows

profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes working with generative AI models, adapting them for confidential computing, and developing AI tools and workflows. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on building and deploying applications around advanced generative models.

phrases.phrase: design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand the strategic direction and translate it into a technical plan, aligning AI development with broader goals.

phrases.phrase: integrating their feedback in our AI roadmap
phrases.justification: This shows an understanding of incorporating stakeholder feedback into the overall technical strategy.

phrases.phrase: strong background in generative AI models
phrases.justification: Directly mentions expertise in generative AI models, which is the core of this task category.

phrases.phrase: explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC
phrases.justification: Indicates research and development in applying generative AI techniques within a specific paradigm (MPC).

phrases.phrase: developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations
phrases.justification: Focuses on creating and adapting AI models and methods for a specific, advanced use case.

phrases.phrase: implementing AI models accordingly
phrases.justification: Refers to the practical application and implementation of AI models.

phrases.phrase: adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm
phrases.justification: This involves modifying and optimizing existing AI model architectures for a specialized environment.

phrases.phrase: technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
phrases.justification: Involves the practical implementation and integration of AI model architectures.

phrases.phrase: developing new techniques and methodologies
phrases.justification: While related to modeling, the development of 'techniques and methodologies' can also imply building the software components that enable them.

phrases.phrase: implementing AI models accordingly
phrases.justification: This involves the practical coding and integration of AI models into a system.

phrases.phrase: technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
phrases.justification: This directly refers to building and integrating software components (AI toolkit) that house the model architectures.

phrases.phrase: work closely with our DevRel team and actively contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows
phrases.justification: This involves building user-facing tools and defining development processes, which are software development tasks.

phrases.phrase: design & execute a technical AI roadmap
phrases.justification: Roadmap planning often includes considerations for deployment, monitoring, and maintenance, which are MLOps concerns.

phrases.phrase: suitable AI development workflows
phrases.justification: This implies establishing and optimizing the processes for developing, deploying, and managing AI models in production.

phrases.phrase: in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team
You will work closely with our cryptography team
You will have regular touchpoints with AI developers on the Nillion network
